titleStmt.title: To the Honourable the House of Commons assembled in high court of Parliament: the humble petition of the Lord Mayor, aldermen, and commons of the City of London, in Common Councell assembled. Together with an humble representation of the pressing grievances and important desires of the well-affected freemen, and Covenant-engaged citizens of the City of London.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.

notesStmt.note: In two parts. part 2, The humble petition of the Lord Mayor, aldermen, and commons of the City of London, in Common Councell assembled. .. Together with the severall answers of both Houses of Parliament to the said petitions and representation, has a separate dated title page, pagination and register. Catchword on page 6 (1st sequence) ties the two parts together.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
